newsitem.title: USA: Wall Street declines at opening.
newsitem.headline: Wall Street declines at opening.

text.p: The Dow industrials opened down on Thursday, tripped up by a slightly higher than expected rise in the core April consumer price index.
The Dow Jones Industrial Average was off 13.19 at 7,272.92 points but the Nasdaq Composite was up 0.94 at 1336.49.
The 30-year long bond was off 14/32 to yield 6.92 percent.
